      • performSearch

        public <T> T performSearch(BaseCriteria criteria,
                  java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                  int nestedLevels)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Actually makes the HTTP server call, and parses the search results.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type defined by the class passed to this method.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the search criteria
        clazz - the type of result object.
        nestedLevels - the level at which the desired object will be present in the response object.
        Returns:
        the parsed object of type T
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
